trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Edmond
There were no other sightings in Edmond on or around September 30th 2013
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting at a stop light in edmond, ok. i had the sunroof cover open. something caught my eye. earlier i had been commenting on how clear the sky was. i kept looking up today wondering about the cme reported and looking for chem planes. i could not believe it. i was so stunned at first, somewhat mesmerized. my teenage daughter was with me as i had just picked her up from class. i started yelling, "what is that omg, what is that??? look, look!!" she said she didn't see any thing. i turned her head slightly as it was above us but also right in front of us. she was like, "i don't know, i think it's a balloon" then it shot up and west. she said, "that is not a balloon!" the light had changed and people were honking. it was a very busy intersection and i couldn't believe people weren't looking up. we were heading west and i kept trying to keep track of it. it shot around; zig-zagged when it was right in front of us again it went from clear to silver to clear and sometimes iridescent; with tails or tentacles hanging from it...they were light green, purple and pink..maybe yellow. i was trying to find a place to pullover when it shot up. i pulled into what we call "the bus barn"; where public school buses are parked. it came back toward us and just hovered. it eventually just disappeared. it was there and then it was gone! i got a still shot of it which only looks like a bright object. you can barely make out the tentacles, but you can see them if you enlarge it. i also have a very short video. i was just aiming the camera at this point because i could not see it through the lens of my phone. i waited several hours before i sent it to my computer. when i watched the video i could not believe it! there was a second object; long cigar shaped that flew by at such a rapid speed i did not even see it with my naked eye. it may have been some light reflection from somewhere but i had my phone\camera out the window; window was down. i sent a message to local weather station. they asked for the pic but have not responded. i have to know, was this just a weather balloon? was the second object some light reflection? most importantly, i cannot stop thinking about it. it did not look like a space "craft". it looked like an actual being itself. also, i am extremely irritable tonight and just want to be left alone. almost like the very presence of someone else is extremely annoying. i feel like i've had some kind of experience and believe me...i have never believed in et's. i saw something else recently too on sept. 6th. i have only been looking to the skies in anticipation of ison. oh! and shortly after it was gone and we were driving home, there were very low flying planes; not just small engine planes but a jet as well. the jet was headed south and was still west of us. weather balloon? please tell me! if you watch the video, watch full screen. i didn't see the second object until i had it on full screen which also makes me think it was a digital anomaly. thank you!
Summary: Sometimes Clear;sometimes silver/light; with colored tentacles. Jellyfish!
